welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bhalswa Jahangirpur, a charming city known for its rich history and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this beautiful destination has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The original terminal of Indira Gandhi International Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newly constructed terminal for domestic flights, designed to handle the increasing passenger traffic at the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The main international terminal of Indira Gandhi International Airport, equipped with modern facilities and amenities.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi for up to 45 minutes after which they can purchase additional usage time.
